article.title: EADS North America To Supply U.S. National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency With Radar Satellite Data
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: EADS North America has received a five-year contract valued at $85 million from the U.S. National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency to provide commercial radar satellite data for use in intelligence, military and homeland security applications. Under the contract, the company will supply imagery from its TerraSAR-X synthetic aperture radar satellite, along with related products and direct downlink services.
